name: Modern Combat 2: Black Pegasus
summary: An improbably realistic shooter with magnificent graphics! As an American infantryman, you receive a task to capture the terrorist. Pass through 12 interesting missions in various corners of the Earth. In the game there’re 15 types of weapon. There is also a multiplayer (4 various modes) with possibility of game up to 10 people at the same time.

alternative_names.name: モダンコンバット2：Black Pegasus
